Technique: FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL; PAINTED
Name: Globular bottle
Description: Globular bottle with short, slightly flared neck and unstable base. The surface is painted orange and there is a decoration, organised in a wide frieze on the upper half of the body, consisting of four-petalled flowers and bunches of grapes, separated from each other by vertical chestnut- brown bands. On the sides, decoration based on spikes.
